pullrequest.title: add one more layer for motor transmission

content.raw:
HaptixControlPlugin is getting quite large. It also breaks with our style. I've broken our some classes, and fixed the style in the `motor_transmission_nate` branch see 3bb7118.

The JointHelper header is still missing documentation.
